page.title: 05NEWSPAPERS
page.content: Three quarters of these were the Evening Post and the second most popular was the Yorkshire Post with 5% of total sales.Others are Daily Express and Daily Telegraph with 4% the Daiy Mail 3%,Wetherby News and Sun,Sporting Life,The Times,The Financial Times,Daily Star all at 1%. The least popular was the New Journal of which he only sold 1 copy per week.Its quite surprising that there is such a large percentage of evening papers sold as opposed to papers delivered early in the day. On the whole,Collingham is quite a quiet village with the main news being car crashes which is not suprising as there is a main road (A58) running through the centre of the village.
